id: Stan Lee: World remembers Marvel Comics writer, co-creator of the Avengers and Spider-Man
paragraph:
Updated 
    
      November 13, 2018 14:03:19
    
Stan Lee has been remembered as a pioneering force in the superhero universe and the inspiration for generations of artists, writers, actors and fans.Lee's influence extended from the readers of his first comic books to the audiences of the Marvel films in which he made cameo appearances.DC Entertainment chief creative officer and former Marvel writer, Jim Lee wrote, as a shy, awkward kid growing up in a strange, new world Stan Lee gave him the greatest gift of all."He gave me a place to escape into — an endless, imaginative playground filled with the most amazing, fantastic and uncanny heroes ever," Jim Lee said."He taught me the true measure of a person was not defined by their powers but by the strength of their virtues and their commitment to truth, justice and tolerance."
